svcproc.title: REMOVE HOOD TILT ASSIST SPRING ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Tilt Assist Spring Assembly on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood

figure.caption: Figure 8. Remove Tilt Assist Spring Assembly on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood

step1.para: Release hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt hood assembly to a 45 degree angle. Support tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the tilt assist spring assemblies, then detach tilt assist spring assemblies as follows.
Refer to Figure 8 for all items in parentheses.

step2.para: Remove cotter pin and flat washer (Item 1) from retaining pin (Item 2) at the tilt assist spring assembly clevis (Item 3) and tilt assist spring bracket (Item 4) on top of the radiator (Item 6), passenger side shown.
Pull out retaining pin (Item 2) that secures tilt assist spring assembly clevis (Item 3) to tilt assist spring bracket (Item 4) on top of the radiator (Item 6), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side tilt assist spring assembly.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Tilt Assist Spring Assembly on 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood assembly to a 45 degree angle. Support tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the tilt assist spring assemblies, then detach the tilt assist spring assemblies as follows.
Refer to Figure 9 for all items in parentheses.

step2.para: Remove cotter pin (Item 1) and flat washer (Item 2) from retaining pin (Item 3) at tilt assist spring assembly clevis (Item 4) and tilt assist spring bracket (Item 5) on top of the radiator (Item 6), driver side shown.

Pull out retaining pin (Item 3) that secures the tilt assist spring assembly and hood safety cable and spring assembly clevis (Item 4) of the tilt assist spring assembly (Item 7) and hood safety cable and spring assembly (Item 8) to tilt assist spring bracket (Item 5) on top of the radiator (Item 6), driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove passenger side tilt assist spring assembly.

step1.para: Disconnect the front end wire harness connector and ground connections on the engine side of the dash panel.
Remove the wire harness from the frame rail loop clamps. (The harness stays with the hood.)
